item.title: Broadway’s Conrad Ricamora Starts Scholarship Fund For Asian Actors Amid Casting Controversy
item.description: The scholarship fund comes after “decades of erasure” for Asian American actors in theater, but also after a white actor was cast in Broadway’s ‘Maybe Happy Ending.’
